definition: Korean ethnic group in China (mainly in northeast China)/the Koreans (major ethnic group on the Korean Peninsula)
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
morning
few/rare
fresh/bright (in color)/delicious/tasty/delicacy/aquatic foods
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
Yanbian Korean autonomous prefecture in Jilin province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3] in northeast China, capital Yanji city 延吉市[Yan2 ji2 Shi4]
pinyin: Yan2 bian1 Chao2 xian3 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1

definition: Changbai Korean autonomous county in Baishan 白山[Bai2 shan1], Jilin
pinyin: Chang2 bai2 Chao2 xian3 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

sentences.english: It is a region inhabited by an overwhelming majority of the Korean minority nationality in China.
sentences.chinese: 長白山區，是我國朝鮮族同胞的主要聚居地。

sentences.english: Educated Korea nationality youth W told us a story.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮族知青W來我們戶玩的時候講了一個故事。

sentences.english: Hunchun is a county-level city in Yanji Korean Autonomous Prefecture in Jilin Province.
sentences.chinese: 琿春市隸屬於延邊朝鮮族自治州的縣級市。

sentences.english: The intake of vegetable in the Korean-Chinese and Han nationality is lower than Chinese Dietary Guidelines.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮族和漢族老年人蔬菜攝入量明顯低於推薦量。

sentences.english: How can we prove that Korean is related to Eastern Yi ethnic groups in Shang Dynasty?
sentences.chinese: 怎麼就能證明朝鮮族與東夷族有關係呢？

sentences.english: Chinese Korean artistic song originates in the region of Yanbian Korean Autonomous Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 中國朝鮮族藝術歌曲形成於延邊這一特定的空間。

sentences.english: This is the Korean-Chinese restaurants, very clean.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是朝鮮族飯店，非常乾淨。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the influence of depressive symptoms and its relative factors in the Korean-Chinese students in junior high school.
sentences.chinese: 分析並探討影響朝鮮族初中生抑鬱症狀的相關因素。

sentences.english: Chapter III compares the language competence of the Korean nationality in the three countries.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是三國朝鮮族語言能力比較。

sentences.english: Eating Glutinous rice cake, is a grand festival for Yanbian Korean people on Dragon Boat Festival.
sentences.chinese: 喫打糕端午節是吉林省延邊朝鮮族人民隆重的節日。
